dialog.title: Disclaimer
dialog.body:
This is a free app that visualizes the 'public places visited by cases during infectious period' public data provided by the Ministry of Health.

The developer DOES NOT guarantee that the data displayed within 
1) is without errors 
2) is always up to date

The developer is not an employee of any government organization nor is the developer associated with any government organization.

dialog.title: Privacy
dialog.body:
The app does not store any location or user data on the cloud.

All data input from user are stored locally on your device.

OneMap.sg is the provider for nearby places based on user's GPS coordinates. No personal data(except GPS coordinates) of the user is sent during this process. OneMap is the authoritative national map of Singapore with the most detailed and timely updated information developed by the Singapore Land Authority.

tips: Wear a mask when you leave your house
Wash your hands frequently with soap or hand sanitizer
Keep a safe distance of at least 1 metre
See a doctor if you feel sick
Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth
